channel.title: Australian Government Announcements (Daily)
channel.description: Unified feed of Australian government announcements generated daily

item.title: Appeal for public assistance after 80kg of cocaine seized in Sydney
item.description: This is a joint release between Australian Federal Police and Australian Border Force

item.title: Shepparton man guilty of importing anime child abuse material
item.description: A 25-year-old Shepparton man has been convicted of child abuse material offences after ABF officers discovered alarming anime images on his mobile phone at the airport.

item.title: Eleven foreign fishers found guilty, including shark finning crew
item.description: This is a joint media release from the Australian Fisheries Management Authority (AFMA) and Australian Border Force (ABF)

item.title: Norwegian diving duo sentenced over thwarted $26 million cocaine import plot
item.description: This is a joint media release between Australian Federal Police, NSW Police Force and Australian Border Force

item.title: NSW man charged with allegedly producing AI-generated child abuse material and possessing bestiality content
item.description: This is a joint media release between the Australian Federal Police, NSW Police Force and Australian Border Force.

item.title: ABF detains foreign fishers, destroys boats and seizes 2.1 tonnes of sea cucumber
item.description: Two fishing vessels were also destroyed after allegedly illegally fishing in waters off the Northern Territory
